ygData.subject: DOAC-- is the EQ addiction wearing off??
ygData.msgSnippet: My answer is a resounding no -- but what do you think? I know my guild has lost about 1/2 dozen to DOAC. I also know about the same # who have already come
ygData.messageBody:
My answer is a resounding "no"-- but what do you
think? I know my guild has lost about 1/2 dozen to DOAC.
I also know about the same # who have already come
back to EQ from DOAC. I hear it's cool and different,
but i'm just not interested in leaving EQ at all-- I
mean, I've never even been to the Mines of
Nurga!!!<br><br>AND-- i started playing on the roleplay server, which
has strengthened my addiction 100 fold!!! I just wish
there were more halflings to talk too. <br><br>Other
games have come and gone-- I used to play a little bit
of a lot of games until i got EQ a year ago. Some
people are saying that 2 years is the max cut off-- that
everyone gets tired of it by that time-- well then-- i've
got another year to go!!!! And with Luclin coming
soon, and the fact that i haven't played a PvP char
yet-- i'd say i'm set for as long as Verant will take
my +/-$10.00/month (which, i'm sure, would be long
after the stop supporting EQ-- haha). <br><br>Any
thoughts??<br><br>Xev---<br>Xela Orcbane<br>Serrafina Elemistress<br>Mandir
D'terrible<br>Sscaylee<br><br>FV--<br>Rumble
